name: Final Embrace

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Int 3; naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack; base attack bonus +3.

sections.text: You gain the constrict and grab special attacks. Your constrict attack deals damage equal to your unarmed strike or primary natural weapon melee attack. Further, you can grab and constrict opponents up to your size.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can grab and constrict creatures one size smaller than you.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: naga, serpentfolk, or creature that has the constrict special attack
description: Your coils are particularly deadly, allowing you to constrict opponents of your size or smaller.
